description:
As advocates for victims, our team at Evans Moore, LLC, aggressively fights for your best interests in personal injury, misconduct and other incidents. Our law office in Georgetown takes cases throughout South Carolina that involve matters such as the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Workplace incidents and workers' compensation
  • Civil rights and jail misconduct
  • Bad faith insurance
  • Assault, battery and sexual abuse
  • Nursing home abuse and medical malpractice

Since we opened the doors to our law office, we have recovered more than $50 million through verdicts and settlements. The founding partners of our practice collaborate on your case to ensure that you have the most comprehensive representation available. Our team has earned honors that include each attorney being selected for inclusion in South Carolina Super Lawyers and Rising Stars for multiple years; being selected for The Best Lawyers in America; being listed in the American Society of Legal Advocates' Top 40 Lawyers Under 40; and being named in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best for Client Satisfaction.

When we take on your case, we stand by your side from start to finish. Your first initial consultation with Evans Moore, LLC, is free. We also meet with you wherever is convenient for you, whether that is at one of our two law offices, in your home, in the hospital or virtually. You can count on us to support you and fight for you every step of the way.

The Best Lawyers in America 2013. Copyright 2012 by Woodward/White, Inc., Aiken, SC
